title: Savoring The Moment with Avo
itunes:title: Savoring The Moment with Avo
description: This week we are live from Seabrook where there is an Avo Savoring The Moment event going on. David is back from NYC where he attended a Winston Churchill event.Join us as we smoke some Avo's, find out the latest about the rebranding and all the madness that is The Cigar Authority. ﻿
content:encoded: This week we are live from Seabrook where there is an Avo Savoring The Moment event going on. David is back from NYC where he attended a Winston Churchill event.Join us as we smoke some Avo's, find out the latest about the rebranding and all the madness that is The Cigar Authority. ﻿
